00015 template <class ValueT, class WeightT = ValueT>
00016 class TWeightedNumber
00017 {
00018 public:
00019        typedef ValueT ValueType;
00020        typedef WeightT WeightType;

00255 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00256 inline bool TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::IsImportant() const
00257 {
00258        return m_weight > I_EPSILON;
00259 }

00290 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00291 typename TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::ValueType TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::GetValue() const
00292 {
00293        Q_ASSERT(IsImportant());
00294 
00295        return (m_sum / m_weight);
00296 }

00299 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00300 inline void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::Normalize(const WeightType& weight)
00301 {
00302        TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>(m_sum * weight / m_weight, weight);
00303 }
00304 
00305 
00306 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00307 inline void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::GetNormalized(const WeightType& weight, TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& result) const
00308 {
00309        result.m_sum = m_sum * weight / m_weight;
00310        result.m_weight = weight;
00311 }
00312 
00313 
00314 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00315 inline void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::Scale(double scale)
00316 {
00317        m_sum *= scale;
00318        m_weight *= scale;
00319 }
00320 
00321 
00322 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00323 inline void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::GetScaled(double scale, TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& result) const
00324 {
00325        result.m_sum = m_sum * scale;
00326        result.m_weight = m_weight * scale;
00327 }

00358 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00359 inline void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::SimpleAdd(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& value)
00360 {
00361        m_sum = (m_sum * value.m_weight + value.m_sum * m_weight);
00362        m_weight = (m_weight * value.m_weight);
00363 }
00364 
00365 
00366 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00367 inline TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::GetSimpleAdd(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& value) const
00368 {
00369        TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> result;
00370        
00371        GetSimpleAdd(value, result);
00372 
00373        return result;
00374 }
00375 
00376 
00377 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00378 inline void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::GetSimpleAdd(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& value, TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& result) const
00379 {
00380        result.m_sum = (m_sum * value.m_weight + value.m_sum * m_weight);
00381        result.m_weight = (m_weight * value.m_weight);
00382 }
00383 
00384 
00385 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00386 void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::SimpleSub(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& value)
00387 {
00388        m_sum = (m_sum * value.m_weight - value.m_sum * m_weight);
00389        m_weight = (m_weight * value.m_weight);
00390 }
00391 
00392 
00393 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00394 TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::GetSimpleSub(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& value) const
00395 {
00396        TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> result;
00397        
00398        GetSimpleSub(value, result);
00399 
00400        return result;
00401 }
00402 
00403 
00404 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00405 void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::GetSimpleSub(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& value, TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& result) const
00406 {
00407        result.m_sum = (m_sum * value.m_weight - value.m_sum * m_weight);
00408        result.m_weight = (m_weight * value.m_weight);
00409 }

00411 
00412 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00413 inline void TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::Add(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& value)
00414 {
00415        SimpleAdd(value);
00416        Normalize(::sqrt(m_weight));
00417 }
00418 
00419 
00420 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00421 inline TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::GetAdd(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& value) const
00422 {
00423        TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> result;
00424 
00425        GetSimpleAdd(value, result);
00426        result.Normalize(::sqrt(result.m_weight));
00427 
00428        return result;
00429 }

00434 {
00435        GetSimpleAdd(value, result);
00436        result.Normalize(::sqrt(result.m_weight));

00444        Normalize(::sqrt(m_weight));

00460 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>

00462 {
00463        GetSimpleSub(value, result);
00464        result.Normalize(::sqrt(result.m_weight));

00468 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00469 inline bool TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::operator==(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& number) const
00470 {
00471        return               (m_sum == number.m_sum) &&
00472                                    (m_weight == number.m_weight);
00473 }
00474 
00475 
00476 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00477 inline bool TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::operator!=(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& number) const
00478 {
00479        return               (m_sum != number.m_sum) ||
00480                                    (m_weight != number.m_weight);
00481 }

00484 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00485 inline TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::operator+(const TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>& value) const
00486 {
00487        return TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>(m_sum + value.m_sum, m_weight + value.m_weight);
00488 }

00491 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>

00493 {
00494        return TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>(m_sum - value.m_sum, m_weight - value.m_weight);

00500 {

00552 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>

00554 {
00555        m_sum /= value.m_sum;

00561 
00562 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00563 inline imath::TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::operator+(ValueType scalar) const
00564 {
00565        return imath::TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>(m_sum + m_weight * scalar, m_weight);
00566 }
00567 
00568 
00569 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00570 inline imath::TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::operator-(ValueType scalar) const
00571 {
00572        return imath::TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>(m_sum - m_weight * scalar, m_weight);
00573 }
00574 
00575 
00576 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00577 inline TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::operator*(double scalar) const
00578 {
00579        return TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>(ValueType(m_sum * scalar), m_weight);
00580 }
00581 
00582 
00583 template <class ValueT, class WeightT>
00584 inline imath::TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT> TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>::operator/(double scalar) const
00585 {
00586        return imath::TWeightedNumber<ValueT, WeightT>(ValueType(m_sum / scalar), m_weight);
00587 }
